title: Salisbury Steak
directions: Mix 1/4 cup cream of mushroom soup, ground meat, bread crumbs, egg , onions and Beazell's Cajun Seasoning. Shape into 6 patties, brown in skillet. Pour off grease. Stir in remaining soup and mushrooms. Cover, cook about 30 minutes or until done.
ingredients: 1 can of cream of mushroom soup (divided into 1/4 & 3/4 cups)
